com.giganticsheep.wifilight.mvp.view

Interface LightView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hannesdorfmann.mosby.mvp.MvpView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LightColourFragment, LightControlActivity, LightDetailsFragment, LightEffectsFragment, LightFragmentBase

    public interface LightView
extends com.hannesdorfmann.mosby.mvp.MvpView
    Created by anne on 29/06/15. (*_*) Interface implemented by UI elements for the Presenters to control the UI
